LanguageData.SmokeleafButter.label: 大麻黄油
LanguageData.SmokeleafButter.description: 把烟叶花苞在牛奶中泡煮然后制成黄油
LanguageData.HempFlour.label: 大麻面粉
LanguageData.HempFlour.description: 由大麻种子研磨制成的烘焙的大麻面粉
LanguageData.HempMilk.label: 大麻奶
LanguageData.HempMilk.description: 在水中浸泡过的烟草种子研磨成的“奶”
LanguageData.HempProtein.label: 大麻蛋白质粉
LanguageData.HempProtein.description: 大麻种子研磨成细腻的粉末以补充蛋白质
LanguageData.SmokeleafSeedOil.label: 烟草食用油
LanguageData.SmokeleafSeedOil.description: 烟草种子压榨成食用油，毫无医用价值但是可以用于烹饪
LanguageData.SmokeleafBrownie.label: 烟叶布朗尼
LanguageData.SmokeleafCookie.label: 烟叶小甜饼
LanguageData.SmokeleafCookie.description: 一种会让你感觉很舒服的小甜饼
LanguageData.SmokeleafNutriLeaf.label: 烟叶营养棒
LanguageData.SmokeleafNutriLeaf.description: 一种用水果和烟叶制成的零食能量棒,很有嚼劲
LanguageData.SmokeleafDeEnergyDrink.label: 烟叶能量饮料
LanguageData.SmokeleafDeEnergyDrink.description: 在接下去的五小时不要做任何计划.
LanguageData.SmokeleafSmoothie.label: 烟草奶昔
LanguageData.SmokeleafCandy.label: 烟草硬糖
LanguageData.MealInfused.label: 大麻餐
LanguageData.MealInfused.description: 一个能填饱肚子的简餐，他好像还会让你沉迷.
